definition: variant of 再接再厲|再接再厉[zai4 jie1 zai4 li4]
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
grind/sandstone
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
to guard against pride and impatience (idiom); to remain modest and keep cool
to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move
to strive for mastery (idiom); aiming for the best result/to have high ambitions
to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
to stand a good chance/to have great hopes/to be promising
to win an honor/to strive to win a prize
to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)
to meet a challenge
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
brimming with confidence (idiom)
the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time
to be strongly determined to succeed (idiom)
to win instant success (idiom)
to encourage
